    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphicalView

        public GraphicalView()
        Instantiates a new graphical view. It also loads all of the images that are going to be used in the game, such as the map grounds, and the different units.

    • Method Detail

      • setController

        public void setController(GameController temp)
        Sets the controller. It is called my SetupPanel, which sends it the controller so that the Graphical view can interact with the controller.
        Parameters:
        temp - the new controller

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable arg0,
                   java.lang.Object arg1)
        The map calls notify Observers, and the graphical view will repaint the map to have the changed that occurred.
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer

      • paintComponent

        public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This will first print ever space with the default map background. It will then print a unit if applicable.
        Overrides:
        paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent
